name: The Blood Pit Arena
description: A legendary arena where warriors test their mettle in opt-in PvP combat. No death, no item loss — only glory.

25000.name: The Arena Lobby
25000.description:
A grand atrium of polished obsidian and bronze torches greets you. Banners
of past champions hang from the vaulted ceiling, their names stitched in
gold thread. The Arena Master stands behind a carved stone podium, ready to
facilitate matches. A massive archway to the north leads toward the fighting
pits, while stairs spiral upward to a spectator gallery.

This is a safe zone — no combat is permitted here.

up.description: Stairs lead up to the spectator gallery.

25001.name: Arena: The Open Sands
25001.description:
A vast circular pit of golden sand stretches before you, surrounded by
towering stone walls. The roar of spectators echoes from the gallery above.
There is nowhere to hide here — only raw skill determines the victor.
Blood stains darken patches of the sand.

25002.name: Arena: The Pillared Hall
25002.description:
Massive stone pillars rise from the arena floor, providing cover and
creating deadly corridors. Shadows dance between the columns as torchlight
flickers. A shrewd fighter can use these pillars to their advantage,
breaking line of sight and setting up ambushes.

25003.name: Arena: The Elevated Platforms
25003.description:
A series of stone platforms rise at varying heights above a shallow pit.
Narrow bridges connect the platforms, and the footing is treacherous.
Combatants must balance aggression with caution — one wrong step
could leave you at a dangerous disadvantage.

25004.name: Arena: The Water Pit
25004.description:
Ankle-deep water covers the floor of this sunken arena. Waves ripple
outward with every movement, and the footing is slippery on the submerged
stone tiles. Rusted grates along the walls drain the water slowly, but
it never quite empties. The damp air carries the scent of iron and salt.

25005.name: Arena: The Lava Bridge
25005.description:
A narrow stone bridge spans a bubbling pit of molten rock. The heat is
nearly unbearable, and waves of shimmering air distort your vision.
The bridge is barely wide enough for two combatants to face each other.
One solid blow could send a fighter tumbling toward the lava below —
though enchantments prevent actual death.

25006.name: The Spectator Gallery
25006.description:
Tiered stone benches overlook the arena pits below through enchanted
crystal panels. The magic of the arena projects images of ongoing fights
onto the panels, allowing spectators to watch every blow in vivid detail.
Cheers and gasps fill the air as combatants clash below. Stairs lead
back down to the lobby.

down.description: Stairs lead down to the arena lobby.

25000.name: arena master
25000.long_desc: The Arena Master stands here, arms crossed, surveying the crowd.
25000.description:
A towering figure clad in ceremonial black and gold armor. Countless scars
tell the tale of a lifetime in the arena. His eyes miss nothing.
